name: 16 Oz. Clear Glass Ball Jar Fragrance Oil Soy Candle
description:
{ DIMENSION & BURN TIME}

+ 2.75" Diameter x 5" Height
+ 60 Hours plus

{ INGREDIENTS }

:> Soy Wax
:> Fragrance Oil 
:> Cotton Wick

Full 16 oz. soybean candle is carefully crafted with premium grade soy wax and high scent throw essential oil, hand poured into BALL vintage glass container. Cotton wick is used for clean burning in your home environment. White color and NO color dye is added

{ CARE }

+ Trim wick to 1/8" to ensure even burning & prevent soot and flame from becoming too large.
+ Never leave soy tea light candles burning unattended.
+ Always place soy candle on a heat resistance surface.
+ Keep burning soy candles away from kids and pets and any flammable objects.
+ Place soy candles in a draft-free area.
+ Recommend to read Care & Caution note on the bottom of the container prior to using the soy candle.

{ PACKAGE }

The soy candle comes with "LOVE" clay tag.

{ RECYCLE }

Glass container can be cleaned and reused for other purposes.

name: Certified Essential Oil Blends
description:
{ SCENT CHOICES (CERTIFIED ESSENTIAL OILS) }

EUCALYPTUS PEPPERMINT essential oil blend is always my favorite during cold winter season. This blend is a combination of pungent, sharp eucalyptus, minty fresh peppermint and little hint of lemongrass. Aromatherapy benefit of this Eucalyptus Peppermint is to help you relax and calm your mood.

LAVENDER scent is known to use for stress reduction, help relaxing and calming actions.

LEMONGRASS LAVENDER essential oil blends consist of lemongrass, lavender, petitgrain and tea tree essential oils. This essential oil blend helps relaxing and getting ready to rest and relax after your long working day.

Facts:

This is undiluted pure essential oil blends. The essential oil blends contains in 1 oz. amber glass bottle with dropper. This essential oil blends must be diluted with carrier oil or water prior application. This essential oil blends is for external use only. To prolong shelve life of essential oils, please keep in cold place and avoid directed sun light and keep out of reach of children.

To use:

Dropping and mixing in olive oil for massage or bath oil
Dropping in warm bath water
Dropping in humidifiers
Dropping in ultrasonic diffuser

Note:
* If you are pregnant, please consult your physician prior to using this massage oil.
* Always consult your physician before using essential oils.

name: Reed Diffusers Set
description:
INGREDIENTS:
Reed diffuser set comes in recycle clear round vase and 10-12" natural reed and 4 oz. diffuser oil. The recycle vase dimension is 4" height x 2.5 diameter. The natural rattan reed sticks draw the oils up and hit the air. Then the fragrance is gently evaporated into the air. Refreshing fragrance will fill up your room for up to 4 months. 

CARE:
Reed diffuser is a great replacement to candles. Without flame, reed diffusers is creating a warm aromatic fragrant through out your room. If the reeds get a little dry or you want a little stronger scent, you can simply turn them upside down and a fresh wave of fragrance will travel to the top of the reeds. 

PACKAGE:
The reed diffuser set comes in Kraft paper box with holiday labels.

RECYCLE:
Glass jar can be cleaned and reused as your flower vase.

name: Aromatherapy Botanical Sachet
description:
Full 2 oz. sachet is carefully crafted with natural corn cob, essential oils and natural dried flowers and packaged in U.S. made muslin cotton sachet (3" x 5").

It comes in 4 different scents:
Citrus Lavender blended scent helps energizing your mood and uplifting your spirit. Having it around your rooms or car will get you ready for the day.

Jasmine & Roses scent helps to focus & increase productivity and concentration. Having it around your rooms or car will get you ready for the day.

Cedarwood is well known to repel moths and other fabric insects. Cedarwood scented sachet protects your wool and fine fabric from moths and other insects. It's great fit in your closet, drawer and your winter clothes storage. 

Lavender scent is known to use for stress reduction, help relaxing and calming actions.

name: Botanical Bath Salts
Massage and body Oil Gift Set
description:
Cure ~ Relieve ~ Uplift set comes with 3 - 0.5 oz. (15ml.)massage and body oil in amber bottles.

This set includes a full pure aromatherapy oils which are used to cure, relieve muscle soreness and uplift your mood.

Cure oil is carefully blended to relax tight muscle and relieve muscle pain with a touch of clean soft floral scent.

Relieve oil is precisely blended to reduce anxiety and help balance nervous system and relieve muscle pain.

Uplift oil will be used to help mood uplifting and calming.

Please test prior to using if you're allergic to nut. 

Essential Oil Ingredients: Ylang Ylang,Ginger root, Patchouli, Bois De Rose, Sweet Bay, Rosemary, Eucalyptus, Bergamot, Sweet Orange, Lavender, Nutmeg, Lemongrass, Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E

name: Aromtherapy Massage Bath & Body Oil
description:
Massage oil has been used as a therapeutic tool to nurture and heal the body for many years. We are now aware of the benefits of massage and therapeutic oil. 

Available in 3 different scents:

Cure ~Cure massage and bath & body oil is carefully blended to relax tight muscle and relieve muscle pain with a touch of clean soft floral scent. 

Relieve ~ massage and bath & body oil is pure aromatherapy oil which helps calm and reduce your stress and relax your muscle.

Uplift ~ massage and bath & body oil is pure aromatherapy oil which helps calm and uplift your mood and relax your muscle.

To use:
Warm the oil by placing the bottle in warm water. Pour a small amount into your palm, and rub both hands together until warmth is generated. Then massage the oil into the skin.

Massage, body and bath oil comes in 4 oz. dark amber glass bottle.

Ingredients:
Cure ~ Sweet Bay, Rosemary, Eucaluptus, Ylang Ylang, Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Jojoba Oil, VitaminE

Releive ~ Bergamot, Mandarin orange, Lavender, Nutmeg, Lemongrass, Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Jojoba Oil, VitaminE 

Uplift ~ Ylang Ylang, Sweet Bay, Rosemary, Eucalyptus, Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Jojoba Oil, VitaminE


Note:
* If you are pregnant, please consult your physician prior to using this massage oil.
* Please test prior to using if you're allergic to nut

name: Linear Pillow
Set of 24 2 Oz. Travel Tin Personalize Soy Candles for Wedding & Party Favors
description:
With this listing, you can send us your label art in .pdf or Illustrator file format to fit in 1.5 inch round lable. The label will be printed on white or natural Kraft paper. 

SCENTS (You can pick up to 4 scents) from following scent options:
Bay Breeze
Basil, Sage & Mint (Pure Natural Essential Oil)
Black Rasp. Vanilla
Cappuccino
Cedarwood (Pure Natural Essential Oil)

Fresh Baked Bread
Gardenia Lily

Pink Grapefruit & Bergamot (Pure Natural Essential Oil)
Sweet Pea
Tuscan Herb
Warm Vanilla Sugar
White Tea & Ginger

INGREDIENTS:
Each 2 oz. soybean candle in travel tin (2" round x 1.5" high) is carefully crafted with premium grade soy wax and 20% more essential oil or cosmetic graded fragrance oil to create strong scent throw, hand poured into travel tin. An ECO (cotton & paper) wick is used for clean burning in your home environment. White color and NO color dye is added 

CARE:
With proper care, this soybean candle will burn up to 15 hours. Trim wick to 1/8" to ensure even burning & prevent soot and flame from becoming too large. Please read Care & Caution note on the bottom of the container prior to using the soycandle.

Lead-time for this order is 2 weeks, so please plan accordingly! Rush orders can be arranged. 

One sample for approval can be arranged upon request with $4.50 plus $2.00 shipping fee.

name: For Men Gift
description:
4- 4oz.Travel Tin set includes Hazelnut Coffee, Bay Breeze, Cre'me Brulee and Fig scents. 

Hazelnut coffee scent is creating and inviting full energy to your room. A rich and fullbodied Hazel nut coffee aroma is accompanied by buttery appeal of freshly roasted European hazelnuts with a touch of indulgent cream. 

Bay Breeze is a refreshing, clean smell of ocean air coming onto the coast. It will make you feel right on the beach 24/7.

Cre'me Brule'e scent will create a rich, creamy French coffee blend and inviting full energy to your room.

Fig is a floral, lemon-lime blend enhanced by coconut and bergamot with a dry musky background.

Each 4 oz. soybean candle is carefully crafted with premium grade soywax and high scent throw fragrance oil. hand poured into travel tin. An ECO (cotton & paper) wick is used for clean burning in your home environment.

White color and NO color dye is added 

With proper care, this soybean candle will burn approx.15-22 hours. Please read Care & Caution note on the bottom of the container prior to using the soycandle.

Travel tin pack is packaged in one brown Kraft tube. 

Travel tin container can be cleaned and reused for other purposes. Thank you for recycling..

For U.S. customer, this item will be shipped via Fedex. For Puerto Rico and international customers, this item will be shipped via USPS.

Supporting our American soybean growers is always a good thing to do.
